entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Oakville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:46 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Burlington Lift Bridge 9:00 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023
Temperature: 1.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 98 %
Dewpoint: 0.8°C
Wind: NE 50 km/h gust 59 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Low zero.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Amount 15 to 25 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 70. Low zero. Forecast issued 8:40 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then clearing. Wind north 30 km/h becoming light in the morning. High plus 5. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 8:40 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023
